head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MAYNARD, DELOS (DEE) L.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MAYNARD, DELOS (DEE) L.

block.p: MAYNARD-Delos (Dee) L. On August 1, 1997. Beloved husband of Margaret M. (nee Greene). Loving father of Dee, Rev. Lewis, Moira Weidenborner, Brian, Pamela Tarpey and the late Gregory. Proud grandfather of eleven grandchildren and five greatgrandchildren. Wake Sunday, 2-4 and 7-9 PM, Clavin Funeral Home, 77-22 4th Ave., Brooklyn. Mass of Christian Burial Monday, 10 AM, St. Anselm's Church. Donations to St. Agatha's Church, 702 48th St., Brooklyn, NY 11220.
